content: the cuddly cloud bonding squares is a crochet pattern for bonding squares for preemie babies the squares are quick to make they call for dk weight yarn the sample squares use berroco pima soft the pattern includes written instructions using standard united states crochet terminology it has been tech-edited and tested sizing and gauge sizes one size approximately 6 x 6 gauge exact gauge is not critical feel free to adjust the number of row to achieve a square shape crochet supplies needed yarn dk weight #3 light approximately 110 yards for two squares shown berroco pima soft 100% pima cotton 124yds 113m /1 75oz 500g #4600 daisy 1 skein crochet hook size size f/5 3 75 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle 2 optional stitch markers tape measure stitch key chain s chain s double_crochet double_crochet pm place stitch marker repeat repeat single_crochet single_crochet skip skip space s space s st s stitch es special stitch abbreviations and instructions 4-double_crochet shell work 4 double_crochet in one stitch notes crochet base chain loosely so that the edge does not curl place stitch markers on edge stitches and move them up as you go along to keep edges even optional beginning chs of row do not count as sts for a wider square adjust base chain by adding sts in multiples of 6 learn more about crochet stitch multiples at https //craftingeachday com/crochet-stitch-multiples/ 1 a wider square will require more yarn for a longer or shorter square add additional row by repeating row 3 please note that the pattern is available
